attributes.action: Nominate Bobby Moore for a Posthumous Knighthood in New Years Honours List
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If we are attempting to host the 2018 World Cup Finals and want FIFA to view us as a nation that that is serious about football then the new PM needs to recommend Bobby Moore for a knighthood in the new year honours list.
Bobby Moore should have been knighted while he was still alive, come on PM 'right a wrong' and put this great mans name up there alongside other worthy recipients.
